entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure in ilconformance jmp #78579
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector256.VectorUnaryOpTest__ConvertToDoubleUInt64.ValidateResult(UInt64[], Double[], System.String) #78576
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline (`dotnet-runtime-perf`) completely broken for `main` #78575
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Runtime fails to generate native System.Private.CoreLib in source-build bootstrap #78574
  • Quic listen internal error #78573
  • [API Proposal]: <T>[].TryGetOffset(int offset, out <T> value) #78571
  • [API Proposal]: System.String.TryGetChar(int offset, out char letter) #78570
  • Reusing RC2 CryptoDecryptor with the combination of DeflateStream causes invalid reads starting from net6. #78569
  • [Telemetry] Sockets telemetry like "bytes-sent" is using wrong CounterType #78568
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived - determine final newline #78565
  • [ppc64le][.net7] Unhandled Exception: System.PlatformNotSupportedException: System.Data.ODBC is not supported on this platform #78563
  • AccessViolationException in System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates tests #78560
  • gcc fails to arch-cross-compile on GNU/Linux in NativeAOT .NET 7 #78559
  • Support modifying already initialized properties and fields when deserializing JSON #78556
    8.0.0
  • Arm64: If Conversion can bypass overflow checks #78554
  • [.NET 6] BufferFileStreamStrategy fills GC Finalizer Queue #78553
  • [API Proposal]: Abstract System.Reflection.Emit public types #78542
    8.0.0
  • runtime-coreclr superpmi-collect failed with System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (55): No buffer space available #78541
    8.0.0
  • Add config switch to fully disable hot-reload #78540
  • Assembly loader event tracing is very expensive (10x application slowdown) #78539
  • Incomplete managed stacktrace in windbg #78538
  • Any way to mask a (broken) extension method? #78530

Closed

  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.ComplexTests.Reciprocal(real: 0, imaginary: -1) #78298
    8.0.0
  • Only canonical types show up in profilers for generics #77007
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Vector256\\Vector256_r\\Vector256_r.cmd #76280
    8.0.0
  • Debug symbols on Linux in Native AOT have lots of DWARF errors #78410
    8.0.0
  • CVE-2022-3786 - Any impact? #78536
  • net6.0-ios: AOT compiler fail when UnmanagedCallersOnly has CallConvs #75700
    8.0.0
  • FreeBSD build break with cmake version 3.25.0 #78528
  • non-ASCII being rejected #78514
  • Multi-threading bugs in System.IO.Packaging #78547
  • Support modifying (rather than replacing) already-initialized properties and fields when deserializing #30258
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime.AttributeTargets - does not list Record #78552
  • Unification of CoreCLR and Mono - AOT / NativeAOT #78504
  • Update runtime Invoke exception handling #67457
    8.0.0
  • Mono work necessary to support IL-based invoke #68928
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Generics\\Exceptions\\general_class_instance01\\general_class_instance01.cmd #77363
    8.0.0
  • Failing to build FreeBSD - `src/native/libs/System.Native/pal_networkstatistics.c` #78522
  • Debugging in visual studio creates interference with authenticationservice.js #77252
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF]Make mono dotnet pathing dynamic #78581
    area-Infrastructure
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Pod Updates November 2022 #78578
    area-Meta
  • update System.CommandLine and adopt to breaking changes #78577
    area-System.Console
  • Clean up members/signatures/visibility in deps_format/resolver #78572
    area-Host
  • Adds samples into `Microsoft.Extensions.*` readme files #78567
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/7.0] Fix commit accounting for large pages #78564
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Anonymous pipe resource leak when DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle is not called #78562
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Removed range checks have ordered side effects (#78554) #78561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey and List copy to Array #78558
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • [Android] Prevent exceptions with a 'Success' message in System.Net.NetworkInformation #78555
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Relocate phase prefetch #78551
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Allow inline relocations in dehydrated data #78545
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #78532
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Replace MD5 with MurmurHash3_128 in SPMI #78527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Improve the handling of Create, CreateScalar, and CreateScalarUnsafe for vectors #78236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete temporary instrumentation for #76280 #78537
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make sure to check for isUsedFromSpillTemp() before optimizing float comparison in code gen #78548
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Fix usage of implicit pointer types in a few more places… #76878
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Code quality concerns #78485
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add win-arm64 entry for browser-wasm cross pack #78535
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • Do not dehydrate data if CFG is enabled #78546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix commit accounting for large pages #78531
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove `ContextEntry` from assembly binder - store `Assembly` directly #78533
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix freebsd cross build with cmake 3.25 #78534
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] source build backports #78395
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Call RhNewArray through RuntimeImports #78529
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add check for interval->writeThru in the assert #78418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Pin FreeBSD build image to fix build break #78526
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CreateSegment events #78430
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove unused argument from IL test entrypoints #78501
    test-enhancement

Updated

  • Fix jmp.il after #78501 #78582
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 #78247
    NO-MERGE, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • [Release/7.0][PERF]Fix Mono Dotnet Generation #78413
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Minor optimizations for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove invalidation of whitespace in TryGetNextExtendedAttribute #78465
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm] More jiterpreter cleanup #78519
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use a list for tests in src/tests/run.py #78463
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Change the default SuperPMI collection location #78513
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #78015
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] VN implicit cast fix for normalize-on-load #78524
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, new-api-needs-documentation, api-ready-for-review, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add support for delegate GDV in R2R and NAOT #77267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix justMyCode behavior #78066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Release/6.0][PERF] Fix perf repo branch setup target, tool build, and mono-dotnet create #78411
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #78470
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.x
  • Add System.Diagnostics.Process README.md #78525
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 8.0.0
